Comment_02: Notes Toward a New Variety of Pumpkin
Comment_03:
I firmly believe that Hateno Village's
charm is in the delicious vegetables
and milk from our farms.<sp:0:4:0>But there's no denying that these
things just aren't resonating with the
youth nowadays.<sp:0:4:0>And I've got no business being mayor if
I can't fix that.<sp:0:4:0>So I got together with Nack, the best
farmer in these parts, and we came up
with a new type of pumpkin.<sp:0:4:0>The color, shape, and appearance are
based on the Cece brand aesthetic,
which is popular with the young folk.<sp:0:4:0>We've hit a snag though. It might be
a bit before we can achieve our goal of
shipping the pumpkins out.
